                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Ahead of each election the Electoral Commission and the SABC formalise a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               cooperative agreement in terms of which a basket of services are rendered. This
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               agreement is colloquially referred to as the SABC Umbrella agreement. Flowing from
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               the umbrella agreement are six service charters that are agreed to and signed between
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               the SABC and the Electoral Commission. The service charters articulate the outputs,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               deliverables, timeframes and obligations of each of the parties.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               The charters give expression to the constitutional mandates of both the SABC and the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Electoral Commission. The Electoral Commission is constitutionally enjoined to ensure
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               free and fair elections. This, the Electoral Commission achieves by promoting
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               knowledge of sound and democratic electoral processes, promoting conditions
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               conducive to free and fair elections and promoting voter education. The Electoral
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Commission recognises the mass reach of radio and television as preferred platforms
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               for citizens to access information. There is extended access through digital platforms
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               that SABC provides for the public as hubs of information and education. This research
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               based approach, based on the longitude study of HSRC as released in 2022, informs
 898       Q1 2024/25               2024/04/15                 Electoral Commission (IEC) of South Africa                                    SABC Umbrella Agreement                                South African Broadcasting Corporation SCO (Pty) Ltd (SABC)        R        126 500 000,00 the choice of structured civic and democracy education over radio and television                2024/03/25         2024/04/01                 2029/03/31                Reported
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               platforms.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               The SABC delivers its public mandate to educate via a business unit known as SABC
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Education. The unit provides content on both radio and television.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               The SABC now reaches 26.8 million people through 19 radio stations and six
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               television stations.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               It is estimated that viewers spend on average three hours a day watching SABC
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               television channels.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               For the majority of rural people and illiterate people radio and television remain the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               most available and widespread medium of receiving information. With radio in the first
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               place.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               It is submitted that the SABC is a sole supplier in that it (SABC) possess unique and
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               singularly available capacity to meet the requirements of the Electoral Commission.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Reasons in support of sole supplier status of the SABC
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Radio and television are a popular medium amongst South African. In a study
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               conducted by the HSRC in 2021 (Voter Participation Survey) read together with
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Longitudinal Study of 2022, it is revealed that television and radio are effective
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Ahead of every major election, a competitive bid process is run to appoint an audit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               firm specializing in ICT related system and controls audits to review the Results
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               System and provide assurance to senior management and political parties that the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               system performs in the way that it should. This is particularly important given that a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               new system has been built for NPE 2024.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 The PFMA SCM Instruction NO. 09 Of 2022/2023 prescribes that the Accounting
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 officers and accounting authorities must publish open competitive bids on the e-Tender
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Portal, for at least 21 days, except in urgent cases when bids may be advertised for
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 such shorter period as the accounting officer or accounting authority may determine.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         In terms of Section 64 of the Electorate Act 17 of 1998, the Electoral Commission is
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          obliged to establish a network of voting stations throughout the country, which is is
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  used to conduct electoral activities.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         With the current situation around unstable power supply and frequent power outages
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          due to load shedding or dameges to the power infrastructure it is necessary to take
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         precautionary steps to ensure that all voting stations are equipped with some form of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    alternative or emergency lighting.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Apart from that, some voting stations currently do not have an existing supply of power
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        and it is, therefore, necessary to ensure acceptable operational conditions to enable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        voting activities on 29 May 2024 as well as during 27 and 28 May 2024 when special
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     votes are cast across the country.
 954       Q1 2024/25               2024/05/13               Electoral Commission (IEC) of South Africa                     Rechargeable Voting Station Emergency Lights                                              Not indicated                          R                    -    Irrespective of the best effort intended through the collaboration with Eskom, the latter        Not indicated      Not indicated              Not indicated              Reported
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        cannot commit to continuous power supply over the election period as load shedding
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         may be necessitated for the maintenance or repairs to electricity generation plants.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           It is particularly noticeable that the country has been without load shedding for a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       number of weeks at present. This is a significant achievement for Eskom over the past
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        number of years. However, the strain it places on power generation plants, especially
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             with the upcoming winter season, cannot be overlooked as that could lead to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        significant power outages in future which may include the critical period at the end of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           May 2024 during month which the elections are held.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Limited time is left in preparation for NPE 2024 which does not allow for an adequate
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          window period to advertise a tender for the prescribed minimum period of 21 days
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       since it is no longer possible to close, evaluate and award a new tender in time to allow
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       for delivery before voting commences on 29 May 2024. Hence we have requested to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         advertise a tender on an urgent basis for a period shorter than the required 21 days.
